overview: In contemporary Brazil, a theater group tries to stage the story of Cassandra and Agamemnon.  Cassandra, prophetess of Apollo, sees everything and speaks nothing.  This is the story of what they saw and what they didn't see.  A film about the power of seeing and the risk of being seen.  About what we didn't see in the disaster that engulfs us all.
title: Fala, Cassandra
